rooms.description: Large open space near the entrance; designed to welcome natural light and incorporate Vastu principles by positioning the main door in the south-east direction.
Adjacent to the entrance hall with a seamless flow into the open-plan kitchen; includes large windows for light and views.
Integrated kitchen area with modern appliances; designed to maintain a clean line between cooking space and dining area. The kitchen is positioned for proper ventilation as per Vastu principles.
A cozy guest room with minimalistic finishes reflecting Brutalist design elements.

Large open studio combining living, working and sleeping areas; incorporating raw concrete finishes to adhere to Brutalist style. Features a central feature element as the courtyard is visible through large openings.

openings.description: The main entrance is positioned at the south-east corner of the plot, ensuring positive energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Large north-facing window in the living area to promote natural light while maintaining privacy.
East-facing window in the kitchen area to ensure proper sunlight and ventilation.
West-facing window in the studio area to balance light and energy.
North-facing balcony with a view of the central courtyard and garden.

external_spaces.description: A central open-air courtyard integrating green space into the layout; designed to enhance air circulation and natural light, aligning with Vastu principles.
Extensive garden area on the south-west side of the property, providing ample outdoor space and privacy.
